Detailed Description

MapDialog class is the dialog to select a localization.

MapDialog is the dialog show a world map and select a localization in a easy way.

void MapDialog::SetHomePosition ( double  lon,
double  lat 
) [slot]

Update home location to lon and lat coordinates. The lon and lat variables are in degree. lon is positive to east and lat is positive for north.
